channel.title: How to add a custom Item to server
channel.description:
I have a 317 rsps and was wondering how I would add a custom Item such as a black partyhat to my server.
Thanks.

item.title: How to add a custom Item to server
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“The Provoked, post:1, topic:348474”]I have a 317 rsps and was wondering how I would add a custom Item such as a black partyhat to my server.

Thanks.[/quote]
The easiest thing to do is go into your class8.java CLIENT sided and recolor one…
As for other customs, download the model into your client model folder, add the ints to your class8.java, add the item to your item.cfg <–last one is server sided. Then go to your item.java and put the ID whereever it would go (plate, helmet, ect…)

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a custom Item to server
